inn1.comm: that's a real loosener, wide outside off stump, no pace no bounce, the ball hits the grass just before it reaches Ramdin and the keeper fails to collect cleanly
that's another shoddy ball, slow and down leg side, Ramdin does well to dive to his right and stop it. At first glance, this pitch has no pace.
Rampaul finally gets one straight, on a good length around off, Dhawan stays in his crease and plays the ball into the covers
Dhawan tries to swivel and pull from his crease but the short of a length ball skidded on to him and hit the body

an appeal for lbw from Rampaul after the ball pitches on a good length round middle and bends back into the left-hander, Dhawan presses forward and is hit high on the pad. No one else was interested in the appeal
Dhawan is hit on the pad once again by a fuller ball sliding down leg side, he falls over in his crease a little
this time he gets bat on ball, flicking the ball through square leg, but there's protection on the boundary

a full length outside off stump, a bit too wide for Rahane to chase so early in his innings, he strides forward and shoulders arms as the new ball swings away a touch. That over took ages to complete, but it's done now.
a good length ball around off stump, a hint of shape into Dhawan, who strides forward and punches to mid off
that ball is going nicely of Dhawan's bat now, he moves forward and opens the face to steer the ball to point, doesn't beat the field though
a length ball, pitching on middle and off and angling across, Dhawan stays in his crease and drives the ball to cover

bowled him, that is a fine delivery! Taylor pitches on a good length just outside off, the ball is fast and it nips back into the left-hander, Dhawan comes forward to play across the line and leaves a gap between bat and pad. The ball screams through to hit off stump
full and straight, Rayudu gets behind the line and drives to mid-on, that one shaped away from the right-hander a little
a full ball on off, Rahane moves across and clips it towards mid on
short of a length outside off and it cuts back into Rayudu, who tries to cut without moving his feet, he was beaten under his bottom edge
there's bounce in the pitch now. Rampaul hits the pitch hard just short of a length outside off and the ball climbs after Rayudu lets it go
defended on the back foot on the off side
loud cheers from the Kotla crowd after Rayudu opens the face of his bat to a good length ball around off and manages to squeeze it past gully. That was a thick outside edge
good length very close to off stump, Rayudu presses forward and shoulders arms
a bit too full this time with room outside off, the batsman moves forward and drives through cover, Samuels chases and dives but the ball wins
a full ball swings away from Rahane outside off, he comes forward and pushes the ball into the covers
strays on to the pads this time, Rahane attempts the flick but doesn't time it, the ball goes to square leg
pushed towards mid-on on the front foot and Rahane is off for a quick single
defended on the front foot on the off side
edged and the ball races towards third man - the boundary is small - where Rampaul does well to dive and save the four. Rayudu pushed forward and away from his body at a good length ball and edged it
the slower ball nips back into Rahane and hits his pad as he is pushing forward to defend, there's an appeal for lbw but it is unsuccessful, a bit too far forward perhaps
Rayudu gets on to the front foot and defends firmly towards mid off
steered off the front foot towards backward point
the ball angles into the right-hander, pitches on a good length just outside off stump, and shapes away, Rayudu lets it go
good length and angling into the right-hander, dropped close on the leg side for a single
edged again but the ball falls short of second slip. Rahane was caught in his crease and prodded as the ball pitched around off and straightened on the right-hander
wider outside off stump, an easier ball to leave for Rahane
Taylor cuts the ball back into the right hander and hits the top of the pad, the ball lobs towards point where the fielder makes an attempt to catch it. Taylor is certainly troubling the batsmen
a bit too full with room outside off, Rayudu frees his arms and square drives through point, there is a fielder in the deep though
good length around off, a bit slower, defended on the front foot
Rayudu is caught in his crease as the good length ball hurries into him and hits the pad, he was looking to play square. That ball kept a bit low and hit the knee roll.

edged but short of first slip! Rayudu seemed to play the ball with soft hands and open the face a little. After jagging a couple of balls back into the right-hander, Taylor got this one to hold its line outside off and forced the error
played off the pads to short midwicket
good length outside off, left alone by Rahane
a bit fuller and straighter, Rahane gets behind the line and plays on the off side
a length ball outside off stump, Rahane meets it on the front foot and pushes the ball in front of point
good length on middle and leg, Rayudu moves back and across and defends on the leg side
short of a length outside off, Rayudu goes back and punches the ball through cover, got on top of the bounce nicely
that ball hurried on to the right-hander after pitching short of a length just outside off, Rayudu stayed back and defended it on the off side
that's the first bad ball Taylor's bowled today, a wide down leg side
a crisp punch off the front foot to a good length ball but the fielder at mid-on moves quickly to his left and tumbles as he fields
Rahane pushes the ball towards cover and begins to run, Rayudu sends him back early
the slower ball is far down leg side, another wide
good length and the ball keeps a bit low outside off, Rahane takes one hand off the bat as he plays it to cover
good length on middle and leg, played from the crease towards short midwicket
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
a classy punch off the back foot, the ball hurries past the diving fielder at cover but there's a sweep in place

that is some shot from Rahane, he's moved forward and across to flick a length ball from off stump or just outside off stump into the gap on the backward square leg boundary, superb use of bottom hand
good length outside off, defended on the off side
more work or the sweeper fielder after Rahane moves forward and drives a full ball towards deep cover, they run only a single
left alone outside off stump
a full ball just outside off, Rayudu makes a bit of room and square drives to the man at deep point
good length on off and middle, defended with a straight bat to the bowler
like Rampaul, Benn also starts with a wide. Lots of drift for Benn but it slides down leg side and beats Ramdin
flatter ball on off stump, goes back and punches the ball to cover
defended from the crease to the bowler
pushes forward and jams the ball between bat and pad, they take a quick single towards point
angled into the pads, Rahane comes forward and clips it in front of square leg
defended on the front foot on the off side
strays outside leg again, played off the pads to square leg
a length ball outside off, driven to the fielder on the cover boundary.
fuller and straighter this time, driven to long on for one more
played with an open face towards point, Bravo was trying to bowl a yorker
a wide down leg side, seen a few of these today.
a slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, flicked off the pads to deep square
good length just outside off stump, driven from the crease to mid-off but Rahane did not time it well
driven to long on for a single
good length on off stump, Rayudu punches it back to the bowler
a flatter ball on middle and leg, Rayudu nudges off his pads on the front foot, single towards square leg

that's beaten everything, the batsman, the bat, the off stump, the keeper and first slip. What  ripper. Benn drifted the ball into the right-hander, pitched around off and spun the ball away sharply. Rahane pushed forward to defend and was beaten, the ball went between the keeper and slip for four byes
played into the covers for a single
a loud appeal for lbw but that was missing leg, Rayudu tried to play that on the leg side
flicked to deep midwicket for a single
cut off the back foot to point
defended from the crease towards cover
a good length ball around off, the batsman stays in his crease because the keeper is standing up and pushes the ball towards cover
Rayudu waits for the ball to angle into him from outside off and opens the face late to dab the ball to third man and bring up India's 50
caught at cover! A soft dismissal, the slower ball does it for Sammy! Rahane pushed forward way too early and ended up spooning the drive straight to Bravo at cover
good length outside off stump, Kohli stays in his crease and hangs his bat out as he defends
edged and four! Rayudu stays back and cuts but gets a bottom edge that scoots low between the keeper and the first slip. that ball kept low too
played on the leg side for a single
defended back to the bowler
Kohli stays in his crease again and blocks
comes forward this time and presents a straight bat while defending
driven off the front foot to the fielder at cover
good length with some movement away from the right-hander. Rayudu wafts and misses. Taylor tells his captain he wants a slip.
good length on off stump, Rayudu is firmly behind the line as he defends this time
good length outside off stump, Rayudu lets it go again
a fuller ball on middle and leg, driven off the front foot to long-on for a single
good length around off stump, defended on the front foot
good length with some shape away from the right-hander, defended on the front foot towards cover. The players will take a drinks break.
played off the back foot to the catcher at silly point
tossed up on off stump, driven on the front foot to long off
Kohli is finally off the mark with a front foot push to the fielder on the cover boundary
steps out to clip the ball off his pads but can't beat mid-on
driven on the front foot to long off
shot! He goes back in a flash and cuts a ball with some width fiercely to the backward point boundary
short of a length angling into the right-hander, Rayudu stays in his crease and plays through point
too full on the pads, that's a vintage Kohli shot - moves forward, leans across and flicks the ball wristily to the deep midwicket boundary

and again! Outstanding placement. Kohli moves forward and drives the ball superbly through the small gap between mid-on and midwicket. Rampaul chases after it and dives but the ball beats him in the end. But Rampaul has crashed into the ball boy as he dived. The ball boy was standing much too close to the boundary and the sliding Rampaul smashed into him. He's getting some attention from some people. Hopefully he isn't hurt. The ballboy.
nearly in the blockhole, Kohli defends
left alone outside off stump
defended towards the bowler
steps out of his crease and pushes the ball to cover
driven to long on for a single
played with soft hands into the covers for a single

caught at slip! Benn angled the ball into Rayudu, pitched on off and got it to spin away a touch. Rayudu pushed hard at it from the crease and the ball flew quickly off the outside edge to Sammy, smartly taken at waist height while crouching
defended on the front foot on the off side
played to long on for a single
Raina begins to push at one that slants away from him and then lets it go in the end
a length ball with width outside off, punched off the front foot towards long off
a full ball angling into the pads, played to short mid-on off the front foot
good length outside off stump, slightly slower, Kohli reaches for it and is beaten
played through point for a single
full ball just outside off, Raina square drives and hits the ball hard to deep point
defended on the front foot on the off side
Raina steps out of his crease but is beaten by the flight and gets an outside edge that goes wide of slip towards third man
nudged off the pads for a single
good length on middle and off, defended on the front foot
driven off the front foot through cover for a single
full on the pads and Kohli flicks to deep midwicket for one
finds the gap through the covers with a beautifully timed cover drive. It was pitched up again and he gave enough room, Rains caressed it through the covers
still full outside off, driven straight to cover this time
slower offcutter outside off, Raine waits for it and taps it to third man
slower one again at 104kph, full outside off and Kohli drives it to sweeper cover
the full-pitched over comes to an end with this one outside off, Raine drives it squarish now to collect two as the fielder cuts it inside the boundary
flighted and that was way outside off, was going for a wide but Kohli chases by stretching forward and drives it past the covers for four in the gap
fullish and still well outside off, Kohli drives to deep cover for one
short of length on middle and leg, it stops a bit and Raina pushes it down to long-on
flighted full toss and Kohli nearly gave a catch to deep midwicket. He pulled and it reached the fielder after a bounce

dropped, but it was very tough! Raine drove the full delivery uppishly to cover, DJ dived to his left with both hands but could not hold on to the catch. Would have been an excellent catch if that had stuck
slightly short outside off, pushed down to long-on after the turn and that brings up the team's 100
slightly full outside off, Kohli drives to cover off the front foot
slower one at 102.6kph well outside off, Kohli taps to third man for one
but he hits it straight! That's Raina for you..slightly full on middle and leg and what a beautiful lofted straight drive with the full face of the bat to bisect long on and long off
full well outside off now and Raina drives to sweeper cover
on length outside off, Kohli leans forward and turns it to long-on
on length but that's too wide again, Raina drives uppishly, it's in the air but that's in the gap between point and cover point, four more
starts with a length delivery outside off, it's pushed down to long-on
on length outside off, pushed to cover
down leg at 138kph and goes down further for a very wide wide. Ramdin dives full length to catch it
pitches outside leg at 138kph and goes down further for a very wide wide. Ramdin had to dive full length to catch it
wide again, this was not as short or wide, but it went down leg and had to be called a wide
slower offcutter at 112kph, tucked to midwicket
beats him, it pitched outside off and came in,. Kohli looked to defend but the ball came in and hit him on the thigh pad
turns the length delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
slightly full on the pads, driven to midwicket
brings in the length ball from outside off, Kohli blocks
fuller on off stump, driven to midwicket with a forward lean
taps the short of length ball towards middle and leg to deep midwicket
edged but it bounced once before hitting Ramdin's pads. It was outside off and Raina wanted to run it to third man but got a bottom edge
length delivery outside off, Kohli defends it back
short of length on off with a bit of angle, Raina stays back and defends
well outside off and Rains easily taps it to third man by playing it late
short of length outside off, Kohli pushes it away from the body to point
on length around off stump, turned to midwicket now. Can't clear the fielder
slower one at 112kph, well outside off and it gives Kohli enough room to drive it to sweeper cover
length delivery outside off, Raina pushes it back and the batsmen see if Russell gets a hand to it or not. He doesn't, but they still decide against the single as the other fielder got to it
on length outside off, pushed to cover off the front foot
off cutter on length outside off, turned to deep square leg. Kohli ran the first hard but Raina denied him the second
too full and wide and Raina knows exactly where the gap is. He taps it late past point and deep third man for another four
angles it in form outside off, Raina defends on the leg side
slower one at 115kph, but fullish outside off, Raina runs it to third man
length delivery on off is pushed down to long-on for one
short of length on off, gives Kohli time to tuck it on leg past short fine leg for two
back of length outside off, Kohli pushes it to point where a diving Darren Bravo dives to stop it
full on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
outside the leg stump, nudged to short fine leg off the pads
slow off cutter at 117.5kph, but it's short of length on the pads and Raina stays back to tuck it fine down the leg side for four
on middle and leg now, Raina defends it back
fullish well outside off, not much turn and Kohli pushes to backward point
touch shorter on the stumps and Kohli goes back to tuck it to square leg
stays back again for the length ball and defends it on the pitch
touch shorter and wider, he pushes it firmly to cover where DJ dives to stop a few runs
tossed up on leg stump, flicked to midwicket
it's a maiden! It was on length on off, Kohli went back to tap it softly to leg but Ramdin got there quickly
turns the length ball in from outside off, Raina defends
flighted on length outside off, Raina leans forward and blocks
flighted closer to off now, Raina helps it with the turn to deep midwicket
slightly short outside off, Kohli cuts it after the turn to deep point
touch shorter on off, tucked to backward square leg after the turn
full outside off, pushed with a forward lean to cover
slightly slow outside off, not much turn and Raine cuts it late to short third man
smacked! It was short outside off, Kohli rocked back early and tonked it over midwicket in the air for a one-bounce four
fulelr outside off, turned to leg for one
on length outisde off, Raina cuts to point
slightly full outside off, Raina leaves it for the keeper
outside off again, Raina cuts it late on the off side to point
flashes a drive at a tossed up ball but extra cover makes a diving stop
Raina skips out, he is not quite to the pitch but he has it covered with an almighty heave that sends it way into the crowd over deep midwicket
a low full toss now on the pad but Raina does not find much meat on the paddle and it goes to long leg
Kohli lured out with some flight and it dips on him, he has to reach out and push to extra cover
tapped in front of square on leg
walks across  to off and softly works it to the on side
nicely bowled, tossed up full, did not turn, Raina defends with bit of bat and pad
eased to long on for a single. although they were looking for the second
allows an offbreak to skid on and dabs it past the keeper, but short third runs across and stops it near the ring with his foot
bowled slower, pitched up, on off stump, Raina forward to defend
shorter, and he wanted to punch it off the back foot, but hits it into the pitch and is disappointed
not the length where he can lean into the drive and Raina pushes forward for an inside edge to pad
makes room, Sammy angles it on a good length on middle and leg, Kohli pushes it past Raina
dabs a good length ball going across him, to third man
slowish pitched up wide ball, he drives square but the sweeper will get to this easily
caught in an awkward position with this length ball that started outside leg and was angling towards middle, gets a thick edge to point as he lunges at it
drives down the track, bowler gets down to field
half century for Raina off a thick edge to third man's right, was surprised by the bounce on this length ball on off
waits for this flat length ball to arrive outside off, and dabs it past slip to short third man
leans forward outside off stump and knocks it with the turn past the non-striker
saw him coming out and bowled it flat outside off, it almost slipped past Raina but he got some bat on it, just in time
confused by the lack of pace as this arrives outside off, and taps it square for a single
tries to sweep hard but is hit on the pad outside leg
worked with the spin to deep midwicket
taps a length ball to vacant midwicket and rushes back for the second, first half-century for Kohli across Tests and ODIs since February, he smiles broadly
whipped off the pad to deep backward square
hangs bat out to try and dab a short and wide ball but is beaten
back of a length, turned square on the leg side for an easy two
shot! Raina goes over extra cover to bring up the 100 stand, big forward stride to a widish length ball, down on his knee, and lofting it elegantly into the crowd
walks outside off and taps a short of a length ball to midwicket
140 kph length ball on off, Raina manages a thick inside edge to deep square, was uncertain to lean forward into it
slower one, on the pad, worked behind square, and this is another easy couple of runs
had made some room outside leg and had a swat at this length ball, mishits it down to long on
slow, shortish, wide, Raina waits and cuts hard, straight to short third

Taylor breaks the partnership, Raina backed away to leg, but Taylor followed him from round the wicket with a pitched up ball, Raina was not sure what to do with it, tried turning it to the on side, but ended up spooning it to Pollard at deep mid off
gets a 138.2 kph yorker just outside off, and calmly pats it back
was in the slot, full and angled in, but Kohli slogs it straight to midwicket
flat length ball outside off, Dhoni slaps it to extra cover
bowled slower and fuller into the pad, Dhoni gets bat around pad and nudges it behind square
98.2 kph full delivery fired into the pad, Kohli let it go thinking it would slip down the leg side, but it brushes the pad
full again, hit down to long on
comes in with the angle on to the pad, Dhoni moves across, works it to square leg
a low full toss on middle, tapped back to the bowler
very full on the pad, Dhoni reacts fast to bring bat down on it, turns it past square leg's dive, and it is timed well enough to beat the sprinting fine leg
targets the blockhole again, straighter this time, pushed down to long on
Rampaul spot on with the full length, Kohli can only dig it out to midwicket
terrific over this, yet another yorker, around off, Dhoni pats it close to the pitch, trots out, but Rampaul is on to it
full again, Dhoni uses the angle into him to clip it past midwicket, Russell misfields in the deep, Rampaul looks anguished
tossed up and angled in full outside leg, Kohli turns it behind square
slaps a quick length ball to extra cover
nicely bowled, Dhoni jabs forward at one that does not turn, and gets a thick inside edge on to pad
walks out down the track  and takes it on the pad
lunges right forward to defend to the bowler
super end to a top over from Benn, turns Dhoni square with one that turns away quickly, Dhoni defends to off
full toss on off stump, Kohli cannot get under it, and swats it down the ground for a single
gets a big stride out and drives a low full toss to long off
slight inward angle on this full ball and he turns it through midwicket for a swift two

flat strike from Kohli, and he's failed to clear Samuels on the edge of the long off rope, wasn't as full from Rampaul, and Kohli had to reach some way forward, scooped it powerfully, but Samuels does well, gets on his toes, and takes it in front of his head
short of a length into the body, Jadeja nudges to the leg side
shorter, Jadeja rides the steep bounce, and drops it onto the pitch, it rolls to off
slow and slanted across, Jadeja taps it to point
a length ball on the stumps, Jadeja moves across but can only drop it on the pitch
shortish and widish, Jadeja slaps it to the sweeper
fine leg is up, Pollard bowls a length ball into the pad, and Dhoni turns it far away from the fielder
he's walked into this full delivery outside off but his drive is stopped at extra cover, Dhoni was some way down the pitch, and there is a direct hit, but replays show he's made it back comfortably
walks out again, Pollard drops it short and Dhoni nudges it to midwicket for one
slow, full and quite wide, Dhoni stretches, squeezes it behind point
back of a length, cutting across, guided to point
slower one pitched up on the pad, Jadeja was winding up but he can only nudge it behind square
he's hit the gap, a wide ball, and he cuts it between point and short third man
Bravo replies with a yorker and picks it up in his followthrough as Dhoni squeezes it back
keeps strike again with a big stride and a push to covers
walks out to a length ball on off and turns it past short fine leg for two
pushes a pitched up delivery to extra cover and dashes for the single
appeal for leg before as Jadeja pushes forward, but that pitched outside leg
turns this back of a length ball to square leg, can;t get the single again
this was fuller on the pad, and Jadeja tried to swipe it over square leg, but missed
no room, short of a length, on middle, Jadeja runs it to point
charged out early, and Bravo slowed it up on a length outside leg stump, hitting Jadeja as he missed
another slower one, fuller, cutting across from outside leg, Jadeja taps it back
saw it pitching short of a length outside leg and tried to swipe it past short fine, but it was too slow and he inside edges it
slow and wide, Dhoni reaches for it, dabs it to backward point, and gets another run for the ricochet as Darren Bravo hits at the non-striker's end
slower and slower, outside off, Dhoni pushes through cover
ends with a 105.5 kph length ball on the pad, which Jadeja works for a single to square leg
Taylor strikes, and Jadeja's struggle is over, a good length offcutter at 116.5 kph, going across Jadeja, no room at all, and he chops it onto the stumps
and he starts with a four, Taylor bowls a sharp length ball outside off, Bhuvneshwar pushes at it, and the outside edge flies just past Ramdin
pushes a length ball solidly to extra cover and gets off strike
pitched up, into the pad, but Dhoni misses as he tries to work it away
gathers himself and whips a full one past midwicket's dive
he has the width and the pace on this short of a length ball, and calmly guides it past backward point with third man also up
slow length ball outside off, he waits and punches it to long off
widish length ball, Dhoni under edges it behind square on off
100.8 kph pitched up ball, not the length he can get under, and hits it down along the ground to long off
full ball at normal pace now, Dhoni pushes it to the bowler
back to the slower ones, wide outside off, Dhoni picks up one to long off
a full one forced back to the bowler, and he cannot stop it, ball rolls down to long on
136.5 kph, just back of a length, into the batsman, who jabs it away to the leg side
full delivery clipped off middle and leg, in front of square, Dhoni back on strike
Taylor escapes with this, low full toss down the pads, Dhoni tries to nudge it wide of short fine leg, picks out the man, is disappointed with himself
turned behind square leg for a couple
slow and full on the legs, clipped nicely to deep square
ends with a length ball on middle, Dhoni works it through midwicket, and takes two by the time long on runs up
swats a slow and widish one over extra cover,
drags a full delivery around off, down to long on, Pollard in the deep intentionally allows the second, stops the ball, then pushes it away from him, Dhoni duly takes the second
Dhoni winds up for a biggie, but is beaten by another offcutter from Bravo, who also has a stare at his franchise captain
follows up the stare with a yorker on middle, Dhoni jams it through midwicket, and there are some smiles between batsman and bowler
Bhuvneshwar slogs, and slices this length ball from outside off to Pollard at long on, Dnoni stops Bhuvneshwar just as he is about to cross him down the pitch

Dhoni winds up again, but his slog scurries along the ground through midwicket, Shami is haring back for the second, but he has to go back, because Dhoni has lost his balance and fallen down, Shami was almost beside Dhoni by then but the throw is at the bowler's end, and Taylor cannot collect too
gets hold of a 137 kph pitched up ball, slams it down to long on
drags a pull through midwicket and rushes back for the second
Dhoni gets his first six in the last over, cranks up as this full one arrives around off and slams it straight over the bowler
fifty for Dhoni as he opens up to a short ball and hooks it in the air, to the left of the man at fine leg
Taylor gets the last one in the blockhole around off, Dhoni jams it to long on and despite Shami's intentions, a single is all they'll get

inn2.comm: pitched up delivery outside off, he reaches forward to drive to mid off
length ball angled into the pad, turned behind square
that straightened, and went just past off stump as Bravo left it, on the bounce to Dhoni
pushes a length ball to mid off
swings in towards the pad, and he clips it to midwicket
bowled fuller, and swings in late, Bravo forces it through midwicket
back of a length, 135 kph, outside off, he gets on his toes to punch to mid off
136.5 kph good length ball hurrying on around off, he forces it off the back foot to point
137 kph and much fuller now, wider too, Bravo has a look and lets it go in the end
closer to off on a full delivery at 138 kph, some swing in to Bravo, who pushes it to extra cover for a single
pace going up all the time, 143.6 kph now, short of a length, pushed off the back foot to extra cover
straightens from short of a length, and Smith defends carefully
moves across and turns a length ball with the inward movement to midwicket
swings in to the right hander on a good length, he nudges it to midwicket
length ball punched off the back foot to mid off
slips it far across the left hander and it swings further away
straightens on off stump line, Bravo pushes forward to defend
pitched further up on middle and leg, neatly pushed down towards mid on
140.2 kph short of a length, close to off, pushed back to the bowler
much fuller, slight away swing, squeezed off the front foot to cover
straightens on a good length outside off, he leans forward and pushes to cover
140.2 kph, back of a length, right on off stump line, he is hurried into a back foot defensive push
nice, moves it away from just short of a length, 139.4 kph, Smith follows the line uncertainly without moving the feet and is beaten
turned off the pad to deep square leg
swinging in to the pads, Bravo flicks it fine, Yadav runs to his left from deep square, slides and stops it
good length ball on his pads again, turned square, Rayudu's throw misses at striker's end, would have been very tight had he hit
he was in no control of this, but it has gone in the small gap between cover and point, was looking to push this length delivery on the up
no problem this time, it sits up from back of a length and Smith slams it high over the bowler
angled into the pads and he uses that to clip it in front of square for two more
good length around off, he closes the bat face and works it to deep square leg
wants to force this short of a length ball over square leg but cannot get hold of it, it pops up weakly
has a flash on the drive at this wide length delivery, misses, Dhoni goes up in appeal, umpire Gould says no, there was a faint sound there
length ball on the stumps now, defended
punches this length ball straight to cover
he's clobbered this 140.7 kph short of a length ball down the ground, between bowler and mid off, just stands in the crease and flat-bats it in the air
turns this length ball on off behind square leg
length ball angled in, worked in front of square
defends a good length ball to midwicket
widish length ball from round the stumps, left alone
short of a length, jabbed to square leg as it gets big on him
Yadav saves a boundary at deep square with a sprint and a slide, and then gets rid of the ball quickly too, Bravo had timed this nicely off his pads
starts with a 134.5 kph good length ball on the pad, Bravo defends, they have hardly given him any width
pushes a good length ball on off to Dhawan at short cover
right on off stump with the length ball and he eases it to mid off

Smith was gone by a long way had Jadeja hit from backward point, Bravo had put his hand up after pushing a short of a length ball behind point, but Smith kept looking for the single, Jadeja misses by some margin though, and the attempt at backing up is not successful
now Jadeja lets a drive slip through at backward point
pushes on to the front foot, only gets the length ball as far as mid on, got it off the inner part of the bat
Bravo gets his first four, he was getting stuck, opens the face and runs a length ball fine, out of the reach of square third man
leans forward and defends a length ball on off
slight away shape on a 128.8 kph widish length ball, he sees that and lets it go
tries to use the slight angle in to him and whip it to the leg side but goes straight down the pitch instead
and again, unable to use the angle on this length ball, pushes far too straight, to mid on
that is a solid  push off the front foot, straight to mid off though
that has hit the gap between short midwicket and mid on, this cut in sharply from a good length and Smith adjusted nicely, closing the face a bit as he drove at it
136 kph good length ball hits the pad, headed down the leg side easily

pushes it down the track, Shami cannot stop it as he dives, they complete the single, Kohli dashes in from mid off and lets rip, there is a fielder in the way near the non-striker's stumps, then there is the bowler, it just goes over their heads, Kohli smiles
another solid drive to a fielder as Bravo finds mid off
turns a good length ball off middle to mid on for a single
Jadeja misses a run out chance again, Bravo had guided a length ball behind point, and Smith, again, would have been far out as they went for the single, Jadeja shouts in disappointment as he misses
dispatched, short ball sitting up and Smith mows it to the deep midwicket boundary with an emphatic pull

turned in front of square on leg and Bravo survives, he had let go of the bat as the throw arrived, there was a direct hit, but he had just grounded his left foot by then, India appeal, but Bravo is safe
pitched up outside off at 140.2 kph and Bravo has the room to drive, but there is a sweeper in the deep
shot! that has raced between the bowler and mid off, full again from Yadav and Smith leans half forward into a powerful drive
good length and coming in, he turns it down the ground for a single
runs a back of a length ball past backward point
moves across, turns a length ball through square leg and comes back for an easy two
beaten, 139.4 kph good length ball from Shami outside off, Bravo twirls the bat inside the line as he pushes at it
pitched up ball driven, without much timing, to extra cover
slower length ball, he adjusts, waits for it and steers it down to third man
bouncer around off stump line, he bends his knees and sways inside the line
full from over the stumps, worked to long on
pushes a full one to long off
jumps across in the crease and pushes a length ball to the bowler
slightly shorter and he forces it off the back foot, but Dhawan stops it with a dive at point
turned off the pad to deep square
beaten, pushes outside the line of a straightening length ball and it bounces between  bat and pad

right through him, Shami with the breakthrough, this is an excellent delivery, angled in from round the stumps, good length, holds the line after pitching, Bravo has to play at it, pushes inside the line, and the ball brushes off stump to disturb the bails, Shami was appealing initially before he realised he had bowled Bravo
sways away as Shami digs it in short
leans forward and across to play out a length ball to midwicket
pulls bat inside the line as this short of a length ball bounces past
leans right forward and solidly defends this length ball on off to the leg side
digs it in short and it bounces at Pollard, who moves across and nudges it behind square
pushes forward to a tossed up ball and drives to the sweeper
93.1 kph full delivery, he moves forward to tap it to midwicket
that bounced from a length, he was surprised but managed to push it to cover for one
powers a full ball straight to the bowler
leans forward to defend to silly point
didn't turn, Pollard was pressing forward, and an inside edge goes to the leg side
137.1 kph pitched up ball turned straight to midwicket
slowish bouncer, Smith lets it go after thinking about the pull
almost hit it to mid off, wanted to flay a length ball down the ground, went on the bounce to the fielder
taps a good length ball from off towards midwicket
on the bounce to Kohli at mid off again, as he drives off the front foot this time
two bounces to third man as Smith slashes at this widish ball
flat and staying a tad low outside off, he chops it into the pitch
goes for a slog, mishits it down to wide long on
pitched up ball forced down to long on
on the front foot to defend
driven to extra cover, and he cannot stop it cleanly
driven past extra cover to wide long off
full on the pads with the angle and that's flicked to deep midwicket for one
slower delivery into the batsman from length, helped to the leg side for one
straighter delivery outside off, Pollard defends it back
length delivery outside off, Pollard takes a step down and defends again
back of length outside off and shaping away, Pollard moves across again and chases but misses
slightly straighter and Pollard turns it to backward square leg for one
full around off and it's lofted down to long-on for one
on length with some turn outside off, pushed to short cover
length again outside off, pushed towards sweeper cover for one
outside off, pushed off the front foot towards cover
another flattish one outside off, tight length and it's pushed on the off side
breaks the shackles, charges down the ground to take it on the full and tonks it to the midwicket boundary for a big six
back of length outside off, cut off the back foot to point
slower legcutter and that's crunched through the covers for four! Was short of length and wide, Smith eyed it early and smashed it in the gap
angles it in towards the batsman from back of length, there's no room and Smith defends to mid-on
length delivery on the off stump, a watchful Smith defends it back
short ball it's pulled to deep backward square leg for one
back of length towards middle stump, he takes a step down and tucks it to deep square leg
short and flat on off, pushed down to long-on for one
flighted on off with turn, Smith leans forward to defend, Mishra appeals even though that hit the pad
length delivery around off and Smith pushes to long-on to bring up his fifty
takes a step down and drives the flatter one from outside off to long-on
flight and turn outside off with turn, pushed to backward point off the front foot
flighted on middle, leans forward to block it
chipped in the gap for four! It was fullish on off and the batsman chipped it with a cross bat in the wide long-on are to beat Rayudu for four
offcutter into the batsman, Pollard defends it back
on length outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
brings it in from outside off, tucked to deep midwicket for one
pushes the length delivery to cover off the front foot
touch shorter towards off, pushed down to long-on for one
half-tracker on off with a bit of turn, Smith stays back to push it to long-on
long long appeal for the googly which struck Pollard around off stump, but he was a long way down with a big stride and might have struck him outside the line
takes a step down and pushes it to cover
just short of long-on! He charged down and lofted it by taking it on the full to long on with a chip, he didn't hit it too hard
bangs it to his favourite area, goes down on a knee and slog-sweeps the fullish delivery to the midwicket boundary a few rows into the boundary
leans forward and blocks the length delivery on the pitch
bit of inswing into the batsman, nudged just past Raina at midwicket
angled in from around off, tucked straight to midwicket
fullish outside off, pushed down the ground to long-off
towards the middle stump on length, driven to midwicket for Raina
outside off on length, pushed back to the bowler
short of length to end the over outside off, tapped to backward point
length delivery outside off, not much turn, driven to sweeper cover off the back foot
stifled appeal for the googly which hit him in front of leg but was going down
takes a step down and the ball lobs up off the pad towards silly point
flattish around off, he leans forward and blocks
charges down and whips it from outside off to long-on for one
flighted and full on off, chipped again in the air towards long-on after a bounce
flattish on length on off, he goes back to defend it back
strays towards leg side and Smith gets a bit of bat to tuck it fine down the leg side for four
flighted and full on off and middle, pushed down to the bowler
fullish on middle and leg, pushed down the ground to long-on for one
darts a flat one down the leg side for one
on length outside off now, easily pushed down to long-off

loud, animated appeal from Jadeja as he runs towards short leg area! It was quicker and darted in towards middle and leg, hit him on the back pad, might have been inside edge as the appeal was turned down. Replays confirm there was no edge and it was very very close
slow on length outside off, slapped across to long-on where there's a fumble
flighted and full and wide, he drives but doesn't middle it
fullish outside off, slog-swept off the edge to deep midwicket
not much flight for this one on length outside off, he comes down and blocks
angled in towards off, blocks off the front foot again
tonked, that's huge! It was full outside off, Pollard didn't move much and launched it down the ground over long-off for a huge six which hits one of the ad boards
flighted and full outside off, driven to the covers where Rahane misfields and concedes a single
darts this towards middle and leg, it's nudged to midwicket. Shami throws to Dhoni who misses and concedes an overthrow
back-foot push down the ground to long-on
full outside off, smashed down past silly mid-off to long-off
on length outside off, drives uppishly off the outside edge to cover
on off stump now on length, he blocks it back
legspinner with some flight on off, defends it back with a forward lean
pitches it shorter as Pollard charges down and only defends it back
one more six! It pitched on length, Pollard charges down and slogs it to the cow corner area for another massive six. He's connecting everything today, even though that did not get the middle
comes down again to whip it on leg but is hit on the front pad just outside off

trying too many slogs and he edges it on the stumps! It was well outside off, turning away too and Pollard slog-swept against the turn to the leg side. It got a bottom edge and just got the leg stump. Mishra is excited!
welcomes him with a googly from outside off which Samuels manages to defend off the back foot
well outside off and that's swished to cover
angles it in towards the stumps, nudged to midwicket
slower through the air outside off, pushed to sweeper cover
extra short delivery and wide outside off, merely cut to sweeper cover for one
cuts it in from length outside off, inside edge goes between his pads and the stumps to short fine leg
short and slow going towards leg, that's slow too and it's slapped past short fine leg for four in the gap as he was in the circle and it's time for an early drinks
good ball from Mishra, pitches on leg, turns it towards off and Samuels defends off the backk foot
pitches outside leg now and turns it a long way towards middle again, Samuels defends it back
touch fuller towards middle, pushed to cover off the back foot
stifling him on the back foot with turn and the length, he defended it off the back foot
just manages to defend in front of off stump as that one turned and kept low
on off and turning away, Samuels defends to silly point and that's a maiden
fullish and well outside off, driven down the ground to long-off
fuller on the off stump, driven down for one more to long-off
slower cutter outside off, but there's enough room and Smith lofts it easily over the covers in the gap for a four
110.7kph, edged past Dhoni! It was much quicker compared to the last one and was back of length outside off, Smith pushed and got an edge towards the slips where there's nobody
cuts it in from outside off, inside edge off the front foot onto the pad
strays down the leg side, it's nudged to short fine leg where Shami dives sloppily to his left and the ball rolls away for four after hitting his hand
flighted nearly in the block hole, digs it out to cover
length delivery from outside leg, tucked to midwicket after some turn
flighted googly going down leg as the fielders appeal, umpire turns it down. Rahane also catches it at silly point in case there was an inside edge
slightly full on off, he defends it back
leans forward to defend the length delivery back
googly turns in a bit from just outside off, edge rolls down to first slip
fullish outside off, it's driven down firmly past Shami to long-off
bangs in a back of length one outside off, he blocks it off the front foot
short again outside off, not wide at all, Samuels sways out of the line and watches it go to the keeper
offcutter from length towards off stump, pushed to the off side
short ball just outside off, this time he pulls towards mid-on. It was in the air for a while
short again outside off, but it was a touch slower at 128 kph and Smith pulled early to be hit on his waist
punched to long off
pushes forward to one that straightens and takes a thick edge to point
goes back and across to a flat and quick one, and turns it to long on
length ball outside off, punched to the sweeper
gets bat down in time to a quick one and taps it to midwicket
done in the flight as he pushes at it, thick inside edge rolls to midwicket
lofts a pitched up ball, on a couple of bounces, to long on
Samuels cracks a cut to this short and wide one, but Jadeja dives at backward point and saves the boundary with a one-handed stop
Smith has launched this miles in the air, slow and full from Shami, Smith gets forward and slams it over long on

Shami with the breakthrough again, and again he does not realise he has bowled Smith, late inswing on this length delivery that was angled in to Smith, he missed the attempted clip, and the ball hit pad and ricocheted into the stumps
good length, 138 kph, coming in to off, Ramdin defends
that stayed low on off, Ramdin bent his knees to get some bat on it
pushes a flighted delivery to extra cover
angled in full to middle and leg, he pushes it to the bowler
leans forward on a flighted ball and defends it, almost loses his balance
can't get Mishra away, this is a flat ball, but he pushes it to midwicket
he gets a run off Mishra off the 17th ball, as he drives a full one to long off, what a struggle
Ramdin needs one ball, he moves across and drives a full delivery down to long on past Samuels
sets off right away after pushing to mid on, he would have been home safely even if throw had hit, but it was a wild one
short of a length, with width, but Samuels mishits to extra cover, he is hurting West Indies big time
now he tries to move inside the line and flay a back of a length ball through covers, but is beaten
nothing working for Samuels, again he tries to bash a short of a length ball but bottom edges it into the pitch
this had almost hit off stump before Samuels squeezed it awkwardly down to third man, caught on the crease and somehow chopping it away
Ramdin tries to retain strike but he's not placed it too far from cover
Samuels jumps out of the crease to Mishra and drives to long off
full, driven to wide long off
finally gets one away, leaves the crease again, is not to the pitch but easily gets under the ball and lofts it down the ground
pushes to cover off the front foot
pushed through at 87 kph on the pad, defended
works a flat legbreak in front of square on the leg side
and now he is gone, just not Samuels' night, short and wide from Yadav, and Samuels slams it straight to cover
pitches it up full around off, is pushed to extra cover
back of a length outside off, Bravo flashes at it and is beaten
short of a length, 138.6 kph, Bravo hops and works it wide of mid on
drives and picks the gap between cover and point as Yadav provides width again, on a length ball this time, some inward movement but Bravo had it covered
opens the face and runs another length ball to third man's right, Bhuvneshwar fumbles the pick up but no harm done
drives a tossed up ball to long off

Mishra takes out one more in his final over, this is a big legbreak, tossed up, good length, on leg stump, bounces, jags across Ramdin, who tries to defend off the back foot, but the outside edge flies low to slip's right, and Raina dives to snap it up
this has nearly rolled along the ground, googly from Mishra, Russell had no chance of surviving that, fortunately for him, it is headed down the leg side
big googly now, tossed up outside off, Bravo goes hard on the drive, and is beaten by a long way
calmly gets bat in front of pad to block
floats it up around off, Bravo does another forward press to smother it
pitches it up on off, Russell defends carefully
works a short of a length ball in the air but wide of midwicket
flays at this full delivery, and a thick edge races to third man
turns an incoming length ball through square leg for a couple
full delivery elegantly pushed down the ground to long on
Russell wants the single but Bravo has worked this straight to midwicket

Dhoni breaks the stumps and appeals confidently, and he has reason to be, Russell beaten by the sharp turn as he pushes forward, and his back leg is in the air when Dhoni stumps him, sharp work by the captain
lunges forward to push it to the bowler
pushes down the ground to long off
full ball clipped through midwicket and stopped just inside the rope by the fielder running across to his right
drives a full one to the sweeper
two in the over for Jadeja, and he takes off on a run, Sammy heaves and misses, and Jadeja is accurate as always, this does not turn, and disturbs the stumps
back of a length, no room at all, he hops and edges it onto the crease
freefall for West Indies now, Bravo goes after this pitched up delivery, and slices it tamely to long off
backs away a bit to leg and drags a short of a length ball to deep midwicket
swings and misses a short of a length ball that almost takes out off stump
very full around off to end the over, dug out to extra cover
takes it from way outside off and slogs it to wide long on
nine down, and Jadeja has his third, Taylor slogs, doesn't get much distance on it, Bhuvneshwar comes in from long on to take it
straighter one beats him just outside off, Dhoni can't collect
that is a clean, powerful strike, as Rampaul fetches it from outside off and mows it way over long on
fires it in full into the pad, Rampaul whips it in the air on the bounce to deep midwicket
leans forward and defends it back to the bowler
tries to push off the back foot, inside edges on to pad
follows him as he backs away to leg, Rampaul jabs it back to the bowler
drives a full delivery to extra cover
tries to work it off the pads but misses
pushes a length ball to point
full toss flayed to mid off, where Mishra misfields
full delivery, and this has been slammed in the gap between extra cover and mid off
Rampaul top edges a pull, Shami calls for it, and runs towards square leg to hold on to the skier, Dhoni jumps with delight, and plucks out a stump
